name: Duality Demo
description:
This demo was made for the 3rd Discord Libgdx Gamejam.

Gamejam rules was :

  • Theme : Light vs Dark
  • Less than 48h
  • Use Libgdx game framework

Source code available on GitHub

It's an early stage gameplay demo of Duality. A lot of features are not implemented yet : player and tentacula death, combo counter, etc.
